name: WorkExcuseGenerator
0:
”Alexa start work excuses”
”Alexa ask work excuses for a work excuse”
”Alexa ask work excuses to tell me another excuse”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: work excuses
des:
Whether you’ve woken up with a pounding headache (and two empty wine bottles next to your bed) or simply can’t deal with another mindless meeting on a beautiful day, the Work Excuse Alexa skill has your back. 

The Work Excuse Generator skill will provide a mostly realistic excuse for your consideration.

Tried one of the work excuse skills? Please rate our skill and let us know if your boss took the bait. 

Interested in the best Amazon Alexa tricks, tips, news and how-to's? Join the dedicated Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/AlexaNews/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
